test-code.code: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <classpath> <classpathentry kind="src" path="src/main/java" /> <classpathentry kind="con" path="org.eclipse.jdt.launching.JRE_CONTAINER" /> <classpathentry kind="con" path="org.eclipse.m2e.MAVEN2_CLASSPATH_CONTAINER"> <attributes> <attribute name="maven.pomderived" value="true" /> <attribute name="org.eclipse.jst.component.nondependency" value="" /> </attributes> </classpathentry> <classpathentry kind="output" path="target/classes" /> </classpath>
